pages.text: A misting who burns $(thing)atium$() is known as a "$(thing)Seer$()". $(br)Most of the page is missing... (Not yet fully implemented)$(br)The metal atium is extraordinarily rare. Seers who can burn it can see into the future a small amount, and thus can dodge every attack that might befall them (unless the attacker is burning electrum of course).
Interestingly atium doesnt fit the normal metal categories... $(br)I will have to further pursue the subject.
